channel.title: Little problem
channel.description: Well, I got membership a few weeks ago and left on vacation. But I thought that when I got back I would still have a few days left. But I didnt and now I'm stuck with some member items that are worth quite a bit (for me that is). Now can anyone think of a good letter thingy (those that you can send to them through their website) wich can get me a day membership so I can sell those things? Maby it isn't possible but it's worth a shot. I don't want to pay €5 for a game that I won't play in the next few months.

item.title: Little problem
item.dc:creator: @maru maru
item.description:
@maru wrote:

No, it isn’t possible and will never happen.

Read full topic

item.title: Little problem
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

if your not gonna play for a month, wait that month when you do play pay the 3 euros

Read full topic

item.title: Little problem
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Well to most people they aren’t worth that much. I’d say it’s a total of 4m. I don’t have friends that play. €5 Isn’t that much, but it’s the idea of it. But mabey I’ll get 1 month and auto on it.

Read full topic

item.description:

Well, what are the itmems? Because, if your friends play, ask them to pay for the membership, and you give them ***gp?

@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Well, the thing is that I won’t be playing for a while, and I don’t want to throw away €5. But if it’s the only solution, I’ll just have to do it.

item.title: Little problem
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

You can’t, you’ll have to wait, or just buy membership. If you can’t afford, just ask to borrow some off a friend, and then pay by SMS, or just use your friends phone and then use pay by phone, if you can’t do that, then you fucked.

Read full topic
